message: Let's be practical, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
Let's split it fairly, 60-40 is a good deal!
The clock is ticking, Bob. Another round and that 60-40 split will look much worse.  Take this offer!
I'll compromise, meet me in the middle, 55-45 is fair!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob! Each round costs you.  Take the deal and run!
